name: Cannon king Dave
description:
Cannon King Dave
"Cannon King Dave" is a cannon foster and combat simulation game that uses cannons to plan world conquest.
Games with comic-type stories that you can enjoy in a non-stop RPG sense
Idle cannon simulation game!
Build cannons and dominate the world!
Build the indomitable cat legion!
Neighboring Village 1000 floors
Neighboring City 1000 floors
Neighboring Nation 1000 floors
Neighboring Planet
